entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries. Low zero. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 60 percent chance of drizzle changing to 60 percent chance of flurries or freezing drizzle this evening. Fog patches. Low zero. Forecast issued 4:30 PM NDT Saturday 22 April 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries. High plus 3. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 60 percent chance of flurries or freezing drizzle early in the morning. Becoming a mix of sun and cloud in the afternoon. Fog patches dissipating in the morning. High plus 3. UV index 5 or moderate. Forecast issued 4:30 PM NDT Saturday 22 April 2023
